issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Refactor aggregate module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5037](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5037). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The PR splits out the various aggregate functions into separate files and adds a new `aggregate_array` method to the aggregate function trait, allowing more logic to be delegated to each function.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5037?focusedCommentId=16853822) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This PR is stale now and the work is lower priority than implementing parallel query support, so closing this one.
